channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. envoy tells Israeli hostage families he is working on plan to end Gaza War
Friday's market swoon wasn't the first sign of trouble for stocks
The shocking number of companies with no plan to stop workplace violence
Don't blame Powell--here's what's really driving the home affordability crisis
Trapped in your job during a rocky economy? Here's how to thrive anyway.
Trump tariffs inject more uncertainty into global economy
item.description: Trump's extensive new tariff regime on dozens of U.S. partners are launching new trade wars and sending shock waves through markets.

item.title: Trump fires commissioner of labor statistics after weaker-than-expected jobs figures slam markets
item.description: Trump accused BLS Commissioner Erika McEntarfer of being a political appointee who was manipulating jobs data.

item.title: Appeals court keeps order blocking Trump administration from indiscriminate immigration sweeps
item.description: A federal appeals court upheld a temporary order blocking the Trump administration from indiscriminate immigration stops and arrests in Southern Calif...

item.title: Another late-night Trump trade twist — just hours before the world hit go
item.description: Trump’s late-night tariff moves have become a hallmark, catching markets off guard, reshaping deals, and forcing countries to react in real time.

item.title: Stocks close week lower as Trump's tariffs and a weak jobs report rattle market
